import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; export const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: "", password: "", password2: "", }); const { email, password, password2 } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, name: e.target.value }); return (
